attributes.action: Make Halal meat in this country import only.
attributes.additional_details:
Halal meat should not be produced in this country as it is against the beliefs and laws of the U.K.

I think Halal produce should be allowed in this country but only if it is imported in.

I also believe restaurants and food retailers who use Halal meat should legally have to make this information clear to customers and that traditional English type food outlets should not be Halal or at least have options for Halal and non- Halal eaters.
